resources.string: Welcome to the home screen!\n feel free to pick an option from the three activities\nYou can access your saved playlist or find more music to your liking and even listen to music you\'ve downloaded without the use of internet
This is the playlist Activity\nHere is where all your favorite songs are stored in your organized list\nYou have the option to add more playlist to your satisfaction
This is the search activity\n You can search your favorite songs by your favorite artist here!
Enter the song or the name of the artist here
This is the downloaded activity\nYou can listen to the your songs you have downloaded beforehand without the use of the internet click on the button to download more music
Isn\'t she lovely by stevie wonder
Now playing screen\nAn implicit intent is used for the media player which displays which song is playing"
